item.title: About
item.description: The name’s Reedâ€”James Reed. I’m a hobbyist programmer. I develop software in these languages: C clipped iniq sessiond wm-launch Go lifelight nicety tidepool wm-launch Python python-pkgbuilder sessiond Lua awesome-dovetail awesome-ez awesome-launch dovetail lua-sessiond_dbus Shell hdparmify passless toolboxcutter Arduino wio-pomodoro Check out my GitHub profile to see what I’m currently working on, or send me an email with any questions or comments.
